result.eng: The house is situated on the bank of the river.
result.ga: tá an teach suite ar bhruach na habhann
result.orig: tá an teach suite ar bhruach na habhann
result.html: tá an teach suite ar bhruach na habhannThe house is situated on the bank of the river.
result.ponchtml: tá an teaċ suite ar ḃruaċ na haḃannThe house is situated on the bank of the river.

result.eng: I have to go to the bank.
result.ga: caithfidh mé dul go dtí an banc
result.orig: caithfidh mé dul go dtí an banc
result.html: caithfidh mé dul go dtí an bancI have to go to the bank.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ mé dul go dtí an bancI have to go to the bank.

result.eng: Do you have a bank account?
result.html: an bhfuil cuntas bainc agatDo you have a bank account?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil cuntas bainc agatDo you have a bank account?

result.html: in aice leis an bhancNext to the bank.
result.ponchtml: in aice leis an ḃancNext to the bank.

result.eng: He has a lot of money in the bank.
result.ga: tá a lán airgid aige sa bhanc
result.orig: tá a lán airgid aige sa bhanc
result.html: tá a lán airgid aige sa bhancHe has a lot of money in the bank.
result.ponchtml: tá a lán airgid aige sa ḃancHe has a lot of money in the bank.

result.ga: tá mé ag obair i mbanc
result.orig: tá mé ag obair i mbanc
result.html: tá mé ag obair i mbancI work in a bank.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ag obair i mbancI work in a bank.

result.eng: There are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ga: tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.orig: tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.html: tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámhaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: tá áiseanna den ċéad scoṫ ann tá siopaí maiṫe ann oifig an ṗoist scoileanna banc agus linn snáṁaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.

result.eng: The Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.
result.ga: leagtar srianta ar an ngobharnóir de bhua acht an bhainc ceannais
result.orig: leagtar srianta ar an ngobharnóir de bhua acht an bhainc ceannais
result.html: leagtar srianta ar an ngobharnóir de bhua acht an bhainc ceannaisThe Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.
result.ponchtml: leagtar srianta ar an ngoḃarnóir de ḃua aċt an ḃainc ceannaisThe Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
